member.name: M:Fleet.shipCollidesWithFleet(Ship*!System.Runtime.CompilerServices.IsImplicitlyDereferenced)
member.summary: Returns true if the given ship's coordinates intersect with any of the current ships in the fleet

member.name: M:Fleet.hitShipAtCoordinate(Coordinate)
member.summary: Returns true if part of one of the ships is at the given coordinate
